name: Fly Right
about: FlyRight Inc. is a premier flight training institution located at the Concord Regional Airport. Our modern, comfortable, and spacious training center is equipped with state-of-the-art classrooms featuring LED SmartBoards and large-screen displays. We offer a structured learning environment with dedicated study rooms, internet access, and brief and debrief rooms for simulator sessions. Our programs include traditional flight training, group classes, and extensive hands-on training managed by industry experts. We prioritize quality education and student success, ensuring that each pilot is well-prepared for a career in aviation. At FlyRight, we are committed to exceeding your expectations and helping you achieve your flying goals.
